text:
''Capital:'' [[Greenspire]]
''Region: ''[[Lanarakhold]]
''Primary Resources:'' Agriculture, fish, alcohol
''Enemies:'' [[Londurak]]
''Celebrated Virtues:'' Common sense, stoicism, enjoying life. Work hard and don't complain. {{||$:/LanarakAndLondurak}} A small but significant tenant clan of Lanarak is [[Alarak]], a family which boasts a long line of [[sorcerer]]s. See also [[Mror mushroom brew]], a powerful variety of alcohol perfected by Londurak and Lanarak brewers.
title: Lanarak
